hero03.title: Elevate Your Event with Authentic Argentinian Empanadas
hero03.subtitle: Delight your guests with a taste of Argentina.

featureSection.title: Why Choose Kiki Empanadas for Your Catering Needs?

features.text: Experienced in Catering for All Types of Events

testimonials.feedback: Kiki Empanadas made our corporate event a huge success. The variety and flavor of the empanadas were the talk of the night!
testimonials.author: Amanda R.

testimonials.feedback: For my wedding, I wanted something unique and delicious. Kiki delivered beyond expectations. Absolutely recommend!
testimonials.author: Carlos & Maria

cta.title: Ready to Make Your Event Unforgettable?
cta.subtitle: Contact us today to discuss your catering needs.

faqs.question: How far in advance should I book catering services?
faqs.answer: We recommend booking at least one month in advance, especially for larger events.

faqs.question: Can you accommodate dietary restrictions?
faqs.answer: Yes, we offer a variety of options to accommodate dietary needs. Please discuss with us during your booking.

contact.title: Let’s Talk About Your Catering Needs
contact.subtitle: Fill out the form below, and we’ll get back to you as soon as possible.
